title: Auto manufacturers must invest in R&D to make world-class industry: CEA Nageswaran
description: Chief Economic Advisor V Anantha Nageswaran urged automobile manufacturers to invest in R&D to create a world-class industry. Speaking at the SIAM Annual Convention, he emphasized improving global NCAP ratings for better exports and viewing R&D as an investment. He also highlighted India's economic potential amidst global uncertainty.
